rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg001
rows.name:
So... This is the abode of the mighty
Tora?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg002
rows.name:
Hey! Careful with hands!
Lots of breakable and valuable things!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg003
rows.name: Huh? What's this?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg004
rows.name:
Ah! That more than enough fiddling!
Don't handle Tora's stuff!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg005
rows.name:
What's this? All fluffy...
Is this apart of a...swimsuit?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg006
rows.name: That armor for Hana!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg007
rows.name: Armor? This little thing?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg008
rows.name:
This won't provide protection. It's more
like something from a beauty pageant.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg009
rows.name: This Cutie Super-Bikini Armor!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg010
rows.name: Cutie Super-Bikini Armor?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg011
rows.name:
Correct! This newest type of armor,
everyone wish they had!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg012
rows.name: Moreover, attacked parts will be purged!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg013
rows.name:
Is that... Do you mean that if
you get hit it will fall apart?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg014
rows.name: That is right, this state-of-the-art armor!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg015
rows.name:
Tora. I think you have a little explaining
to do here.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg018
rows.name: Mehmeh...

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg019
rows.name: How to defuse Kagutsuchi's anger...

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg016
rows.name: Try to explain

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg017
rows.name: Be defiant

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg119
rows.name:
Erm...if you listen to Tora's explanation,
it make perfect sense!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg101
rows.name: I'm all ears, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg102
rows.name:
This not thing that Tora make...
Nothing to do with Tora really...

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg103
rows.name:
This creation of Dadapon and
Grampypon. Tora never used!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg104
rows.name: Is this true, Hana?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg105
rows.name:
Correct. This armor was designed by
Masterpon's Grampypon.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg106
rows.name:
Masterpon's Dadapon improve design
further and perfect it as armor.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg107
rows.name:
Huh?
Is that right?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg108
rows.name:
That entirely right!
Tora not fib-teller!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg109
rows.name: Masterpon just added purge system to armor.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg110
rows.name: Meh...

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg111
rows.name:
Masterpon work feverishly on this
feature.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg112
rows.name: This is how best Bikini Armor ever made!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg113
rows.name:
Oh, is that so?
That's...very interesting...Tora!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg114
rows.name:
Hana...Hana...
Don't reveal Masterpon's secrets!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg115
rows.name:
Why not? This excellent
opportunity to share Masterpon's
desires and efforts with group.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg116
rows.name:
Hana's right!
Really, this is fascinating. Do continue,
Tora!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg117
rows.name:
I'd especially like to hear about your
views on women.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg118
rows.name: Mehmeh?!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg214
rows.name: Ahem!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg215
rows.name:
This armor that Tora build based on
Dadapon and Grampypon's desires!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg216
rows.name:
This fruit of three generations of
dreams!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg201
rows.name: Tora, this is indefensible!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg202
rows.name:
Also, purge feature
created entirely by Masterpon.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg203
rows.name: Indeed. Tora's manly desires!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg204
rows.name:
I do not care about your desires, Tora!
You cannot dress poor Hana up like this!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg205
rows.name: Tora, you are the worst.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg206
rows.name: Masterpon... Hana not understand.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg207
rows.name: D-don't listen, Poppi!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg208
rows.name:
Hana should be proud of very special,
one-of-kind armor!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg209
rows.name:
Tora, you should get rid of this horrible
thing. Homura, maybe you could just
reduce it to ashes for us?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg210
rows.name: OK! I'd be happy to!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg211
rows.name:
No! Do not destroy Tora's wonderful
creation!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg212
rows.name:
Come here, Tora!
Come here and explain yourself
properly!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg213
rows.name:
No, no! Stop!
Hot! Hot! Meh!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg217
rows.name: It burns!
